description: Transformers for Apalache counterexamples (CEs) with Tendermint blockchains

input.name: first_state
input.description: extract the first state from Apalache CE

input.name: last_state
input.description: extract the last state from Apalache CE

input.name: history
input.description: extract the history from the last state of Apalache CE

input.name: states
input.description: extract all state from Apalache CE

input.name: lightblock_commits
input.description: extract commits from a LightClient block of Apalache CE

input.name: block_validators
input.description: extract validators from a block of Apalache CE

input.name: block_next_validators
input.description: extract next validators from a block of Apalache CE

input.name: block_height
input.description: extract height from a block of Apalache CE

input.name: block_time
input.description: extract time from a block of Apalache CE

input.name: id_to_validator
input.description: transform an identifier into a validator expected by `tendermint-testgen validator`

input.name: id_to_vote
input.description: transform an identifier into a vote expected by `tendermint-testgen vote`

input.name: block_to_header
input.description: transform a block from Apalache CE into a header expected by `tendermint-testgen header`

input.name: block_to_commit
input.description: transform a block from Apalache CE into a commit expected by `tendermint-testgen commit`

input.name: ids_to_validators
input.description: transform a non-empty array of identifiers into Tendermint validators

input.name: ids_to_testgen_validators
input.description: transform a non-empty array of identifiers into `Tendermint-testgen validators`

input.name: empty_array
input.description: just an empty array

input.name: first_validator
input.description: extract first validator from a non-empty array of identifiers

input.name: const_id
input.description: constant identifier

input.name: fixed_validator
input.description: extract first validator from a non-empty array of identifiers

input.name: ids_to_validator_set
input.description: transform an array of identifiers into a JSON-encoded Tendermint validator set

input.name: block_to_signed_header
input.description: transform a block from Apalache CE into a JSON-encoded Tendermint signed header
